name: firebase-atom-challenge
description: Fullstack TODO App - Angular 17 + Firebase Functions + Firestore
author: Miguel Ortega

scripts.setup: pnpm i && pnpm -C apps/functions i && pnpm -C apps/web i
scripts.build: pnpm -C apps/web build && pnpm -C apps/functions build
scripts.test: pnpm -C apps/functions test && pnpm -C apps/web test
scripts.lint: pnpm -C apps/functions lint && pnpm -C apps/web lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm -C apps/functions lint:fix && pnpm -C apps/web lint:fix
scripts.serve: concurrently -n WEB,API "pnpm -C apps/web start" "pnpm -C apps/functions serve"
